messages.content: On June 8th, you will elect MPs to represent Scotland at Westminster. You can choose MPs who will do whatever Theresa May wants - or SNP MPs who will stand up for Scotland. In the years ahead it will be vital to have strong voices for Scotland at Westminster. MPs who will keep a Tory government in check - a Tory government that we know, from long experience, will not have Scotland's best interests at heart. A vote for the SNP will back our plan to end the Tory cuts that are holding our economy back, damaging our public services and pushing more people into poverty, and strengthen Scotland's hand against an extreme Brexit. Now more than ever it is vital to have strong SNP voices standing up for Scotland.

issues.brexitEurope: strengthen Scotland's hand against an extreme Brexit.
issues.economy: end the Tory cuts that are holding our economy back

images.caption: ELECTION COMMUNICATION RE-ELECT MARGARET FERRIER as MP for RUTHERGLEN & HAMILTON WEST SNP General Election Thursday 8th June
